overview: The narrative of three friends as they take a new psychedelic drug and explore the urban inner-city.  However, once Juno, an extroverted, non-binary character, begins to suspect that Teffari, the outcast of the group, is completely sober, the friendship group's dynamic becomes exploited and begins to deteriorate. Leading each character to split off within the metropolis and on their own journey.  This student, short film uses the director Wong Kar-Wai as it's visual and theme influence.
title: Risen Devils
